title: Doc validation errors from XML comments
body:
The docs build is throwing validation issues for some malformed XML tags used in doc comments. 

The fix is to make changes in MSBuild source equivalent to these changes in the docs repo:
https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs/commit/30d2c49a8ccb75faf1748b1abff91fcb7417c4a7
